messages.title: Vote for what you believe in
messages.content: Greens are now 2nd in Lambeth. The Greens are the only party that wholeheartedly supports public services and action to stop climate destruction. Our goal is a fair society and a clean, healthy and safe environment for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Green Party will send the message by opposing rail fare increases and pushing for public ownership.
Pushing for a £10 minimum wage and lower fares.
An end to pay cuts and private charge.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Action on pollution and climate change
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Your Green vote is a clear voice for clean air, opposing the expansion of Heathrow, and promoting public renewable energy.
Battling to save Streatham GP surgeries and A&E.

issues.health: Battling to save Streatham GP surgeries and A&E.

housing.content: Action to tackle the housing crisis

leaflet.personalStatement: Jonathan is a community organizer with a track record of winning campaigns that make a real difference...

endorsements.endorsement: I urge you to support the Greens and vote for Jonathan Bartley

leaflet.additionalNotes: Jonathan's five priorities for the local area: 1) Action to tackle the housing crisis 2) Fair wages 3) Better transport policy 4) Protection of local public services 5) Clean air and green spaces
